channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Athletics' Nick Kurtz, Braves' Drake Baldwin Take Rookie of the Year Honors
item.description: Athletics slugger Nick Kurtz is the unanimous winner for AL Rookie of the Year, while Braves catcher Drake Baldwin took the award in the NL.

item.title: Cristian Hammond's buzzer-beating floater seals Santa Clara's strong first half vs. Xavier
item.description: Cristian Hammond's buzzer-beating floater sealed Santa Clara's strong first half vs. Xavier.

item.title: Columbia Lions vs. No. 3 UConn Huskies Highlights | FOX College Hoops
item.description: Check out the greatest moments and plays in this matchup between the Columbia Lions and the No. 3 UConn Huskies.

item.title: Eagles vs. Packers Live Score, Updates: MNF Has 1st Scoreless 1st Half Since 2009
item.description: A pair of star-studded NFC foes will battle it out to close Week 10, as the Eagles take on the Packers inside Lambeau Field on Monday Night Football.

item.title: How ‘Being OK With Failure’ Helped AL Rookie of the Year Nick Kurtz Find Success
item.description: A four-homer game highlighted Nick Kurtz's Rookie of the Year campaign. But the A's slugger is focused on bigger things.

item.title: NFL Week 10's top performance? Check the results of this week's 'Himmy' Award
item.description: TreVeyon Henderson, Matthew Stafford, DeMarcus Lawrence or Jonathan Taylor -- who earned Week 10's "Himmy" Award?

item.title: Highlights from John Cena's farewell tour
item.description: Here are the best moments from John Cena's "The Last Time is Now" farewell tour, which kicked off at Intuit Dome on Jan. 6.

item.title: Bobby Marks' NBA Contract Year All-Stars: Reaves, Lakers lead 12-man lineup
item.description: Austin Reaves is headed for a massive raise in the offseason. He's not alone.

item.title: MLB Awards Week predictions, results: Kurtz, Baldwin named Rookies of the Year
item.description: Baseball's best players and managers of 2025 are collecting their hardware, starting with a pair of rookies from the A's and Braves.

item.title: Jets' petty post aimed at state of Ohio leads trolls
item.description: Week 10 of the NFL season brought its fair share of trolls once again, led by the New York Jets.
